title: Web Information
description: Information about a web interaction recorded via an ExperienceEvent, including the web page and/or link where the interaction occurred.

xdm:webPage.title: Web Page
xdm:webPage.description: Details about the web page where the web interaction occurred.

xdm:webLink.title: Web Link
xdm:webLink.description: Details about the web link (URL) that corresponds to the web page where the interaction occurred.
